nodes.text: Meen-tris was an Eickarie family, that made up Sav-ro clan and tribe Hu-shi-crive on the planter Kariek during the New Republic era. For centuries the family guarded the secret of the third watch tower entrance to the Cro-sla-trie fortress. Until family member Su-mil used it to help the Imperial Stormtroopers of Aurek Company gain access.
